channel.title: Version 2.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 2.2.0 (2021-09-09) New New Hidden planks be displayed by default 'n th' sitemap generated by Cap'n Hugo an' be therefore vis'ble fer search engine index'n. Ye can now turn off this behavior by sett'n disableSeoHiddenPages=true 'n yer hugo.toml.
